name: Nitish Kansal
description: Front-End Developer for web and mobile applications, who is motivated to combine the art of design with the art of programming. Responsibilities include translation of the UI/UX design wireframes to actual code that produce visual elements of the application. I work with the UI/UX designer and bridge the gap.
